if (WIN32)
  add_executable( MyGUIFontViewer WIN32 ${ALL_FILES} )
else()
  add_executable( MyGUIFontViewer ${ALL_FILES} )
endif()
add_dependencies( MyGUIFontViewer MyGUIEngine MyGUI.Common freetype )
target_link_libraries( MyGUIFontViewer MyGUIEngine MyGUI.Common freetype )
set_target_properties( MyGUIFontViewer PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "MYGUI_USE_FREETYPE")
GUCE_config_lib( MyGUIFontViewer )
